snippet: Stanley Black & Decker agreed on Tuesday to sell its hardware and home improvement unit to Spectrum Brands, the maker of Rayovac batteries and George Foreman grills, for $1.4 billion.
abstract: Stanley Black & Decker agreed on Tuesday to sell its hardware and home improvement unit to Spectrum Brands, the maker of Rayovac batteries and George Foreman grills, for $1.4 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Stanley Black & Decker to Sell Hardware and Home Unit for $1.4 Billion
